data.enText: remaining faithful to sb/sth and supporting them or it

data.chText: 忠实的朋友 / 支持者
她总是信守自己的政治原则。
data.enText: She has always remained loyal to her political principles.

ex.chText: 鲍勃一直是我们家忠诚的朋友。
ex.enText: Bob has always been a faithful friend of our family.

ex.chText: 他是一个忠于自己原则的人。
ex.enText: He is a man who always remains faithful to his principles.
After their marriage, she was faithful to her husband.

synonyms.bx: 指对某人、政党、信念等忠诚的，通常作定语；也指在爱情上忠贞不二的。

ex.chText: 尽管政府受到指责，他依然效忠于它。
ex.enText: He remains loyal to the government despite criticism against it.

ex.chText: 她全家人都是湖人队的忠实球迷。
ex.enText: Her whole family were loyal supporters of the Lakers.

synonyms.bx: 指忠于朋友、国家、原则等并一直对其加以支持的。

ex.chText: 他是一位可以信赖的朋友。
他们需要一个可靠的办法来降低离婚率。
ex.enText: They need a reliable method to decrease the divorce rate.

synonyms.bx: 指某人或某事物可以信赖、依靠的。

ex.chText: 他过去常骑着他那辆忠心耿耿的自行车去见女朋友。
ex.enText: He used to ride his trusty bike to meet his girlfriend.

ex.chText: 她把她那条忠实的狗带在身边。
ex.enText: She had her trusty dog with her.

synonyms.bx: 指武器、车辆、宠物等长期以来一直可以信赖的，通常作定语，常为幽默用法。

tr: unwavering in devotion to friend or vow or cause
example: the true-hearted soldier...of Tippecanoe"- Campaign song for William Henry Harriso

tr: inspired by love for your country

value.def: Someone who is loyal remains firm in their friendship or support for a person or thing.

example.ex: They had remained loyal to the president...
example.tran: 他们始终对总统忠心耿耿。

example.ex: He'd always been such a loyal friend to us all.
example.tran: 他一直是我们大家忠实的朋友。

value.tran: 忠诚的；忠心的；忠贞不渝的

example.ex: They have loyally supported their party and their leader.
example.tran: 他们忠诚地拥护他们的政党和领袖。

trans: 忠诚顾客；忠实顾客；忠实客户；忠诚的顾客
